name: Addresses
businessSemantics: Represents the physical locations where individuals reside or businesses operate.

name: Courses
businessSemantics: Represents the academic courses offered by an educational institution.

name: Departments
businessSemantics: Represents the organizational units within an educational institution, each responsible for a specific area of study.

name: Degree Programs
businessSemantics: Represents the academic programs offered by departments, leading to a specific degree.
joinSql: SELECT * FROM Degree_Programs JOIN Departments ON Degree_Programs.department_id = Departments.department_id

name: Sections
businessSemantics: Represents the different sections or groups within a course, potentially offered at different times or by different instructors.
joinSql: SELECT * FROM Sections JOIN Courses ON Sections.course_id = Courses.course_id

name: Semesters
businessSemantics: Represents the academic terms during which courses are offered.

name: Students
businessSemantics: Represents the individuals enrolled in the educational institution.
joinSql: SELECT Students.*, Addresses.* FROM Students JOIN Addresses ON Students.current_address_id = Addresses.address_id OR Students.permanent_address_id = Addresses.address_id

name: Student Enrolment
businessSemantics: Represents the enrollment records of students in degree programs during specific semesters.
joinSql: SELECT * FROM Student_Enrolment JOIN Degree_Programs ON Student_Enrolment.degree_program_id = Degree_Programs.degree_program_id JOIN Semesters ON Student_Enrolment.semester_id = Semesters.semester_id JOIN Students ON Student_Enrolment.student_id = Students.student_id

name: Student Enrolment Courses
businessSemantics: Represents the courses in which students are enrolled as part of their degree program.
joinSql: SELECT * FROM Student_Enrolment_Courses JOIN Courses ON Student_Enrolment_Courses.course_id = Courses.course_id JOIN Student_Enrolment ON Student_Enrolment_Courses.student_enrolment_id = Student_Enrolment.student_enrolment_id

name: Transcripts
businessSemantics: Represents the official records of students' academic performance.

name: Transcript Contents
businessSemantics: Represents the specific course results included in a student's transcript.
joinSql: SELECT * FROM Transcript_Contents JOIN Transcripts ON Transcript_Contents.transcript_id = Transcripts.transcript_id JOIN Student_Enrolment_Courses ON Transcript_Contents.student_course_id = Student_Enrolment_Courses.student_course_id
